Experiments â†’ Raecyclopedia

For three weeks in 2017, I catalogued everything I looked up online and published it in a question-and-answer format. This is an ongoing replication of that experiment, collecting what I've learned since January 1, 2021.

Art


What are some libraries or museums in the US that house Bruno Munari's work?



Bruno Munari's work can be found at the Istituto Italiano di Cultura (NYC), Museum of Modern Art (NYC), Merrill-Berman Collection (NYC), Toledo Museum of Art, and Walker Art Center (Minneapolis).

Coding


Is there an iOS app for working with source code repositories?



Yes: Working Copy.

Is there a CSS selector for the first line of text?

Yes: ::first-line.

Is there a CSS property that force-justifies the last line of text?

Yes: Use text-align-last: justify;.

How do you change the color and thickness of a header rule in CSS?

Adjust color, line style, and thickness of the border property on the hr.

Cooking


What ingredients are found in dried ghormeh sabzi herb mix?



Parsley, leek, and fenugreek are the key components of a dried ghormeh sabzi herb blend, with cilantro and/or spinach as less common additions.

What is ritual bread?

It is a kind of ornately-decorated bread made for festivals or religious occasions in Eastern Europe.

What is the name of the order of monks who make Chartreuse liqueur?

The Carthusians.

Does an amaretto sour traditionally contain bourbon?

No, though it appears in some recipes to cut the sweetness of the cocktail.

What is the difference between seltzer and club soda?

Club soda has added minerals, giving it a saltier taste than seltzer, which is just carbonated water.

What is dried sumac used for?

Sumac powder has a citrusy taste and can be used in marinades and desserts to impart a tart flavor. It is primarily used in Mediterranean cuisine and is a key component of za'atar.

Gardening


Do violets only bloom once?



Violets bloom constantly, even after their blossoms have been harvested.

What is the best way to sprout pepper seeds indoors?

Soak the seeds first, then place them in sanitized containers of a soil-free, prepackaged starting mix to prevent the growth of fungus.

Can spider plants grow in low-light conditions indoors?

Yes.

Music


How can new samples be added to the Korg Volca Sample?



Use the desktop application vosyr to select desired .WAV files and initiate transfer to the Volca Sample. A 3.5mm audio cable is needed to connect the computer's headphone jack to the Volca Sample's sync in.

How do you record a stereo instrument with the Audient iD4?

Technically, the Audient iD4 only has a single (mono) instrument input. However, you can use the microphone input as a second line in to record live stereo audio with two 1/4" TS cables. Because the gain ranges differ on each input, the gain for the microphone input needs to be increased relative to the gain for the instrument input. For the best adjustment, check the L and R levels on a signal known to have equal levels in each channel to confirm that the levels are equal after gain adjustment.

Travel


Where is Kosovo?



Kosovo is in the center of the Balkans, a group of European countries east of Italy, south of Hungary, and north of Greece.

Is Mao Zedong's portrait on contemporary Chinese currency?

Yes.

Where is Denpasar?

In the southern part of Indonesia.

Videogames


What is the flashy flower sign item in Animal Crossing?



It's a hanawa, a celebratory flower arrangement placed outside newly-opened businesses.

How many stars can be earned in Super Mario Galaxy?

121

What does the Casio Loopy motherboard look like?

What does the Sega Saturn motherboard look like?

In what video game hardware is the Ricoh RF5C68 chip used?

It appears in the FM Towns, Sega CD (as RF5C164) and some Sega arcade boards (System 18 and System 32).

For what platforms was Softporn Adventure released?

Its initial release was on Apple II and Atari 800, followed by a semi-official PC port. A fan-made port for Commodore 64 was created in 2013.

Vocabulary


What does fraysexual mean?



It is a sexual identity describing someone who is only sexually attracted to people with whom they do not have a strong emotional connection.

What does ASIC stand for?

Application-specific integrated circuit
